\chapter{Introduction}
\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/introduction:introduction}}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/introduction::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The predevelopment plan introduces \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RGVFlood}, the handle and internet domain name (\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RGVFlood.com}) used to define the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{LRGV} instantiation of \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc}.


\chapter{Components}
\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/components/index:components}}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/components/index::doc}}
\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics{{rgvflood-sequence}.png}
\caption{Components of the RGVFlood Platform}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/components/index:id1}}\end{figure}
\begin{description}
\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RGVFlood}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Instantiation of \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON} cyberinfrastructure specific to \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{LRGV}

\item[{Primary User Interaction}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Through \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc} for decision support

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Framework of \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON} analytic \& decision support applications

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Geospatial content management server, serving \& storing geospatial and \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS} station metadata

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/WM}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Ecosystem of hydrologic, hydraulic \& stormwater forecast models, pulling geospatial data from \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode} and forcing data from \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS.us}

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS.us}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS} Network Server, serving forcing data, station metadata and flood early warning information

\end{description}
\DUrole{admonition-rgvflood-components}{}

\chapter{Component Interactions}
\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/component-interactions/index:component-interactions}}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/component-interactions/index::doc}}
\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics{{rgvflood-component-interactions}.png}
\caption{RGVFlood Component Interactions}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/component-interactions/index:id1}}\end{figure}
\begin{description}
\item[{RGV Hydrography}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Hydrologic data specific to the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{LRGV}. Includes national \& state level data, along with locally collected data as well as local forcings from \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS.us}. Data stored in \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON} \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{PostgreSQL} database

\item[{RGV Water Model}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/WM} driven by RGV Hydrography and tuned using local forcings

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RGVFlood.com}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
User interface to \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc} tuned to the specific needs of the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{LRGV} users.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS.us}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS} Network Server, serving forcing data, station metadata and flood early warning information.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/WM}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Ecosystem of hydrologic, hydraulic \& stormwater forecast models.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Framework of \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON} analytic \& decision support applications, pulling data through the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode} \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{Django} interface as needed.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/db}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{PostgreSQL} with \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{PostGIS} extensions database server storing \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON} specific data for \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS}, \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/WM} \& \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc} data.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{Django}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{Python} web framework upon which \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode} is built.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{NGINX}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
High performance web server used to serve \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode} components.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{Celery}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
A task scheduling and messaging application used to maximize parallel task processing.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoServer}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Geospatial data server for sharing to \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode} and end\sphinxhyphen{}users directly.

\item[{\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode/db}}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{PostgreSQL} with \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{PostGIS} extensions database server storing \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoNode} \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{Django} and \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{GeoServer} data.

\end{description}
\DUrole{admonition-term-lrgv}{}\DUrole{admonition-term-rgvflood}{}\DUrole{admonition-term-geonode}{}

\chapter{Use Cases}
\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/use-cases/use-cases:use-cases}}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/use-cases/use-cases::doc}}
\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics{{rgvflood-use-cases}.png}
\caption{RGVFlood Use Cases}\label{\detokenize{predevelopment/use-cases/use-cases:id1}}\end{figure}
\begin{description}
\item[{Decision Makers}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Elected officials responsible for regional policy making and recruitment of state \& federal funds.

\item[{Planners}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Jurisdictional and multi\sphinxhyphen{}jurisdictional planners needing to make both operational and strategic decisions in coordination with Elected officials.

\item[{Federal Agencies}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Agencies such as \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{FEMA} and \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{NWS} that provide financial and technical resources for flood response, recovery \& resiliency planning.

\item[{State Agencies}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Agencies such as \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{TGLO} and \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{TWDB} that provide financial and technical resources for flood response, recovery \& resiliency planning.

\item[{First Responders}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Emergency Management Agencies and First Responders utilizing Early Warning information generated by the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS} stations themselves, or from \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON.cc} utilizing higher order analytics.

\item[{Engineers}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Both public sector and private sector engineers, relying on the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/WM} Tier II (\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{HEC\sphinxhyphen{}RAS}), Tier III (\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{HEC\sphinxhyphen{}HMS}) \& Tier IV (\DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{SWMM}) supported models for design development or review.

\item[{Researchers}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
Research engineers and hydrologists are likely use the \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{REON/WM} \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{WRF\sphinxhyphen{}Hydro} instance directly, along with real time data from \DUrole{xref,std,std-term}{RTHS.us}.

\end{description}
\DUrole{admonition-use-cases}{}\DUrole{admonition-stakeholders}{}\DUrole{admonition-stakeholders}{}


\renewcommand{\indexname}{Index}
\printindex
\end{document}
